text: Jennifer Lynn Wexton (n√©e Tosini, May 27, 1968) is an American lawyer and Democratic politician. She was the United States representative for Virginia's 10th congressional district from 2019 to 2025. In April 2023, Wexton announced that she had been diagnosed with Parkinson's disease. In September of that year, she announced that her diagnosis had been changed to progressive supranuclear palsy. ==References== ==Other websites== * Congresswoman Jennifer Wexton official U.S. House website * Campaign website * Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Virginia Category:Lawyers from Virginia Category:Lawyers from Washington, D.C. title: Jennifer Wexton
